item.title: The C Programming Language
item.description: CHAPTER 1: A Tutorial Introduction 1.1 Getting Started Exercise 1-1 . Exercise 1-2 . 1.2 Variables and Arithmetic Expressions Exercise 1-3 . Exercise 1-4 . 1.3 The For Statement Exercise 1-5 . 1.4 Symbolic Constants 1.5 Character Input and Output 1.5.1 File Copying Exercise 1-6 . Exercise 1-7 . 1.5.2 Character Counting 1.5.3 Line Counting Exercise 1-8 . Write a program to count blanks, tabs, and newlines.
